@Josh76715709 @elliotrades The war doesn't have to be over for sentiment to improve. This is a smart business decision. This really isn't a big deal..why do you care so much? Does this impact you negatively in some way?

@Josh76715709 @elliotrades I don't think he would be chastised for not delaying, but its probably better for everyone involved to not launch during times of rock bottom sentiment. It just so happens that the negative sentiment is caused by a war so it makes the delay even more appropriate.
